title: Mountaintop View 12 - 3 - 24 Odom inspiration , Danielson rant , Player of the Week and more from Monday
body_text:
Mountaintop View 12-3-24 Odom inspiration, Danielson rant, Player of the Week and more from Monday
Five years ago, UNLV head coach Barry Odom was on the receiving end of a pink slip, this one from his alma mater the University of Missouri. Now that the “coach firing” season has begun, Odom has words of encouragement for those that either have or will have to clean out their offices and say goodbye.
As he gets his team ready for Friday night’s conference championship game against UNLV, Boise State head football coach spoke about 13 of his current players already getting contacted by other schools to enter the transfer portal next week.
Speaking about the transfer portal…
See who Yahoo Sports says is in the mix for the vacant head football coach job at Utah State along with other potential candidates.
A sterling debut performance by a freshman QB was enough to be named a double winner along with two Wyoming Cowboys in the final regular season player of the week awards.
San Diego State MBB in AP Top 25 newest poll
Find out about the duo that led San Diego State to victories over two Top 25 teams last week that earned this week’s men’s hardwood honors.
Last, but certainly not least, here are this week’s honorees from the women’s side of basketball play for their performances last week.
